titles.title: Hire To Secure our Nation Act of 2020
Hire To Secure our Nation Act of 2020
Hire To Secure our Nation Act of 2020
A bill to provide the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of State with temporary direct hire authority for certain positions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
